title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging          M's Motel 102 N. Cearlock Ave. Cheyenne, OK 73628 Phone: (580) 497-3376 M's Motel is a two story facility with 10 rooms located in downtown Cheyenne. The rooms feature refrigerators, microwaves, wireless Internet, and are individually decorated.         Cheyenne Motel 124 N. L.L. Males Ave. Cheyenne, OK 73628 Phone:(580) 497-3383 This motel holds 63 units. Pets are allowed. There is baggage handling, bus/motorcoach parking, and group rates available.         Croton Creek Guest Ranch 9513 N. 1802 Rd. Cheyenne, OK 73628 Phone: (580) 497-3960 After a long day of adventuring, head back to the ranch’s 20-room, old Western-style hotel for some well-deserved relaxation. Mosey over to the social barn for a hearty meal and good conversation, try your hand at a game of pool or just sit on the wrap-around porch and enjoy the fresh air.
